article.simpara: MyProxy is open source software for managing X.509 Public Key Infrastructure (PKI) security credentials (certificates and private keys). MyProxy combines an online credential repository with an online certificate authority to allow users to securely obtain credentials when and where needed. Users run myproxy-logon to authenticate and obtain credentials, including trusted CA certificates and Certificate Revocation Lists (CRLs). For more information about MyProxy, see the MyProxy Home Page.
The following guides are available for this component:

listitem.simpara: For system administrators and those installing, building and deploying GT. You should already have read the Installation Guide and Quickstart [pdf]
Describes how end-users typically interact with this component. [pdf]
Reference and usage scenarios for developers. [pdf]

article.simpara: Other information available for this component are:

Includes all GT MyProxy guides except Public Interfaces (which is a subset of the Developer’s Guide)
